basics.name: Oscar Storbacka
basics.label: Materials Student
basics.summary: I am a swedish speaking finn, and am studying to become a material engineer specialized in plastics. I have a passion for hardware, gadgets, and good design. When I'm not spending time tinkering on small projects I like to relax with some gaming, music making and tinkering even more.

work.summary: Jolla is an independent designer and developer of various mobile devices as well as their open Sailfish OS and Mer Core open source projects.Headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, Jolla has Research and Development (R&D) sites in Helsinki and Tampere, an office in Hong Kong, and they are establishing R&D operations in China.  Jolla, in Finnish, is pronounced 'yolla'.
highlights: Upheld the QA infrastructure and helped updating and patching the QA software
Manual testing of the software at each new software release
Achieved 'Jolla Harbour Store QA Certified Level 1 Tester' (another way of saying that I tested the incoming apps for Jolla App store)
